alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 7:44PM MDT until April 07 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Fort Morgan, Limon, Southern Lincoln County, Sterling, Akron, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fire. Blowing dust may reduce visibility at times and create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Avoid outdoor burning or any activity that may cause sparks. The strong winds will likely fuel rapid fire growth.
